lead_paragraph: Joaquin Caparros and Paco Jemez have both declared their intention to become the next Spain manager if Vicente del Bosque does not continue in the role.

headline.print_headline: Caparros and Jemez Want Spain Post if Del Bosque Exits
headline.main: Caparros and Jemez Want Spain Post if Del Bosque Exits

snippet: Joaquin Caparros and Paco Jemez have both declared their intention to become the next Spain manager if Vicente del Bosque does not continue in the role....
